<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Copy values from use_firebase_link (if exists) to route_to_public_store_if_not_installed for each of the mobile application records in sys_sg_mobile_application.Â </description>
        <name>Migrate firebase to route to publicstore</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[gs.info('Migration of use_firebase_link to route_to_public_store_if_not_installed started');
var mobileAppGr = new GlideRecord("sys_sg_mobile_application");
if (mobileAppGr.isValid()) {
	mobileAppGr.query();
	while (mobileAppGr.next()) {
		gs.info('Migrating ' + mobileAppGr.name);
		if (mobileAppGr.use_firebase_links !== undefined) {
			mobileAppGr.route_to_public_store_if_not_installed = mobileAppGr.use_firebase_links;
			gs.info('Updating ' + mobileAppGr.name);
			mobileAppGr.update();
		}
	}
} else {
	gs.info("sys_sg_mobile_application table does not exist");
}
gs.info('Migration of use_firebase_link to route_to_public_store_if_not_installed completed');]]></script>
